author: gbrown
msg: Minor tweaks to file browser tutorial; ensure that tab buttons are visible when the tab is selected.

author: olamy
msg: canGenerateReport() must be called after lifecycle (cobertura report check if a file generated by the forking exists).

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1223 Replaced instance variable used to synchronize access to the core's produceAnalysisEngine() with a static semaphore. This serializes access the method that is not thread safe.

author: jleroux
msg: A slighlty modified patch from Sumit Pandit (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1599) - OFBIZ-1599
A new service that, given an orderId retrieve all OrderAdjustments for SALES_TAXES and sum and approximate them by tax auth/tax geo.
The list of amounts is returned as an OUT parameter together with the total.
This new service is used in several places, including:
1) the service that computes the order grand total: it gets the total for taxes by calling the new service
2) the gl posting service get the (summarized) acctg transaction for sales taxes

author: schor
msg: UIMA-1585 UIMA-1586 RAT fixes, and XML parser now generated sources
